feature.label: EclipSLEE
feature.description: EclipSLEE is a Mobicents sub-project, which provides a set of Eclipse plug-ins that increase the development productivity when writing SLEE applications.
feature.license: Red Hat, Inc. licenses these features and plugins to you under certain open source licenses (or aggregations of such licenses), which in a particular case may include the Eclipse Public License, the GNU Lesser General Public License, and/or certain other open source licenses.
